item.title: Bibliography
item.description: Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1984). Quaternionic extensions. In: Proceedings of the IV Coloquio Latinoamericano De Algebra, Mendoza, Argentina. Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1986). Quaternionic extensions and rotations. Notas De La Sociedad Matemática De Chile, 5(1). Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1987). Relations between quadratic forms and certain galois extensions. Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1991). On the square root of special values of certain L-series. Invent. Math., 106, 549–573. Rodriguez Villegas, F. and Zagier, D. (1993).
